title: Images for quartet
creator_credit: Robert Parker, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: Looks at the professional and private lives of the four musicians in the Carl Pini String Quartet (Carl Pini, violin; Gordon Bennet, violin; John Godd, viola; Barbara Woolley, cello) to the music of Debussy and Mendelssohn, and Australian composers Richard Meale and Brian Buggy. Note: A short version of the film ‘String quartet’ made in 1972.
